product_name: Eagle Creek Switchback 22 Wheeled Convertible Luggage - 22"
long_description: The Eagle Creek Switchback 22 wheeled convertible luggage is a study in travel versatility. Sized as a wheeled carry-on or backpack, it features a removable daypack for multiple gear-carrying options.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Switchback 22 wheeled convertible luggage is a study in travel versatility. Sized as a wheeled carry-on or backpack, it features a removable daypack for multiple gear-carrying options.
